R

render(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.mainpackage.Screens.GameOverScreen
Draws all the necessary parts on the screen, them being the exit and the main menu buttons (added to the stage), the backgound and game over textures, and also the drawScrore function is called to draw the player's score
render(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.mainpackage.Screens.GameSetupInfoScreen
Draws all the necessary parts on the screen, them being the back button, the background, the game mode information sprite Checks if the back button has been pressed, and if so, a new game setup screen is set
render(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.mainpackage.Screens.GameSetupScreen
Draws all the necessary parts on the screen, them being the background, the game mode layout and all the objects added to the screen's stage information sprite Checks if the back button or the info button have been pressed
